title: Data Engineer
description: A Data Engineer at Media.Monks, with a thorough understanding of cloud technologies, will help to deploy Big Data solutions, build and manage data pipelines, ETL processes, and cloud data migrations in a production, secure and scalable manner. The data engineer should be a data specialist with strong experience in the deployment and automation of data pipelines, data development, data cleansing, data warehousing, monitoring data processing systems, and dealing with large and various sets of structured and unstructured data. The data engineer will have experience ingesting real-time data from various data sources and designing new data platforms.This position can be based anywhere in Argentina.ResponsibilitiesDesign and build data pipelines on multiple cloud platformsManage and provision cloud solution infrastructureDesign for data security and complianceManage and automate ETL implementationsEnsure solution and operations reliabilityDesign and implement Big Data and Data Warehousing solutions with their corresponding Data Governance processesAble to manage Cloud DatabasesProvide domain expertise around public cloud and enterprise technologyRequirements1-2 years of experience (or more) in cloud migration, cloud strategy and transformation, cloud architecture, and engineeringBroad knowledge of the major cloud vendors with knowledge of AWS. Experience with GCP is a plus, but not required.Experience working with SQL.Certification in AWS as Cloud Architect, Data Engineer, Cloud Engineer (associate or professional) or equivalent work experience is desired.Deep hands-on experience with cloud orchestration toolingBroad cloud architecture and delivery experienceTechnical depth and experience with enterprise networks and VPC networksUnderstanding of the high-level levers for cost-effective cloud deliveryExperience with Linux/Unix administrationExperience working within a team responsible for delivering infrastructure or similar foundational systemsGood knowledge of working with architecture/microservices and knowing how to ‘plug & play’ solutionsStrong analytical problem solving abilityAdvanced Fluency in English. About Media.MonksMedia.Monks is on a mission to create a new future for this industry. Our vision? Build everything with a belief that changing for good comes from changing who does the work. Yep, that means you. Welcome to the party—one global, cross-cultural collective with a passion for using our skills to create better and a better world. That’s how we’re able to connect the dots between data, content, digital media, and technology from everywhere we are—a true end-to-end model. Joining the Media.Monks collective means having the opportunity to create award-winning work with some of the most gifted, focused, joyful, talents from all over the world.At Media.Monks, you’ll be joining a highly ambitious company on a global mission to win the decade by changing the industry for good. Partner to 8 of the 10 most innovative companies in the world, Media.Monks works with established as well as up-and-coming global, regional, DTC and B2B brands, helping them own their data and build out customer ecosystems to elicit smart, efficient, high-impact engines for growth. We deliver table stakes quickly, creating cost efficiencies from day one to push up the creative effectiveness of our work with every cycle.We are an equal-opportunity employer committed to building a respectful and empowering work environment for all people to freely express themselves amongst colleagues who embrace diversity in all respects. Including fresh voices and unique points of view in all aspects of our business not only creates an environment where we can all grow and thrive but also increases our potential to produce work that better represents—and resonates with—the world around us.

title: Online Data Analyst - Argentina
description: We are hiring freelance English & Spanish speaking Online Data Analyst’s for a project aimed at improving the content and quality of digital maps, which are used by millions of users globally. The job would suit someone who is detail-oriented, likes doing research and has a good knowledge of national and local geography.  Full Professional Proficiency in English & Spanish  You must be living in Argentina the last 2 consecutive years  Ability to follow guidelines and do research online using search engines, online maps and website information  You must have familiarity with current and historical business, media, sport, news, social media and cultural affairs in Argentina  Being open to work across a diverse set of Task Types (e.g. Maps, News, Audio tasks, Relevance)  Applicants must be 18 years or over. ID verification must be attached when submitting your application. Working on this project will require you to go through a standard recruitment process (including passing an open book assessment). Additional Job DescriptionTELUS International AI-Data Solutions partners with a diverse and vibrant community to help our customers enhance their AI and machine learning models. The work of our AI Community contributes to improving technology and the digital experiences of many people around the world. Our AI Community works in our proprietary AI training platform handling all data types (text, images, audio, video and geo) across 500+ languages and dialects. We offer flexible work-from-home opportunities for people with passion for languages. The jobs are part-time, and there is no fixed schedule. Whoever you are, wherever you come from, come join our global AI community. www.telusinternational.comThis is a freelance position on a flexible schedule - you can work in your own time whenever work is available. You will be completing research and evaluation tasks in a web-based environment, eg verifying and comparing data, determining the relevance and accuracy of information. You will be provided with guidelines for each task, which need to be followed. The project offers a variety of tasks, and work is paid per task.Why Join the TELUS International AI Community?Earn extra incomeAccess to our community wellbeing initiativeRemote work & Location IndependenceBe your own bossFlexible Hours to fit in with your lifestyleBe a part of an online community

title: Senior Data Analyst
description: T he Open English brand has been a leader in online English language learning for 15 years. The Next U brand, acquired in 2016, also provides a leading online learning platform focused on high demand digital and tech skills such as web and app development, digital marketing, and design. We are proud to be a global education technology (EdTech) leader offering online language learning to adults and to children through its Open English Junior brand, as well as various online certificates in digital, technology and business specializations. We are currently in over 25 countries on 3 continents.Join us, and be a part of our innovative team dedicated to empowering our students. We continuously look for the best professionals in their fields to join our talented team. We offer opportunities to collaborate and implement new ideas in a cheerful and inspiring work.Position OverviewWe are looking for a well experienced and talented data analyst to join our successful and growing BI & Analytics team in a data driven company. You’ll apply your technical expertise to help, solve, inform, influence, support, and execute business decisions in a fast paced and highly dynamic environmentResponsibilitiesUsing your technical expertise and deep understanding of modern BI, data science technologies, methods and tools, you will be working alone or with multi-disciplinary team members reporting, analyzing and assuring data quality to uncover useful information.You’ll work as a link between business stakeholders and the data, generating business insights and enabling data-driven business decision-making.Qualifications 4+ years experience with databases and complex data manipulation and development using SQL  Well proven experience in any enterprise reporting tool.  Experience distilling complex data from web services, data warehouses, structured and unstructured sources and converting data into simple KPIs, reports, visualizations, dashboards and scorecards to drive insights.  Experience performing cleansing, transformation and validation on the data subject assuring its quality.  Strong written and verbal communication skills to effectively relate data to coworkers  Tendency to pay close attention to small details that could impact results  Intermediate or higher written and verbal English skills If you are looking for a dynamic company, working with the latest technologies, great teamwork, professional opportunities and an excellent work environment, this is for you!

title: Online Data Analyst
description: TELUS International AI-Data Solutions partners with a diverse and vibrant community to help our customers enhance their AI and machine learning models. The work of our AI Community contributes to improving technology and the digital experiences of many people around the world. Our AI Community works in our proprietary AI training platform handling all data types (text, images, audio, video and geo) across 500+ languages and dialects. We offer flexible work-from-home opportunities for people with passion for languages. The jobs are part-time, and there is no fixed schedule. Whoever you are, wherever you come from, come join our global AI community. www.telusinternational.com We are hiring freelance English & Spanish speaking Online Data Analyst’s for a project aimed at improving the content and quality of digital maps, which are used by millions of users globally. The job would suit someone who is detail-oriented, likes doing research and has a good knowledge of national and local geography.  This is a freelance position on a flexible schedule - you can work in your own time whenever work is available. You will be completing research and evaluation tasks in a web-based environment, eg verifying and comparing data, determining the relevance and accuracy of information. You will be provided with guidelines for each task, which need to be followed. The project offers a variety of tasks, and work is paid per task. RequirementsFull Professional Proficiency in English & SpanishYou must be living in Argentina the last 2 consecutive yearsAbility to follow guidelines and do research online using search engines, online maps and website informationYou must have familiarity with current and historical business, media, sport, news, social media and cultural affairs in ArgentinaBeing open to work across a diverse set of Task Types (e.g. Maps, News, Audio tasks, Relevance)Applicants must be 18 years or over. ID verification must be attached when submitting your application. Working on this project will require you to go through a standard recruitment process (including passing an open book assessment). This is a long-term project and your work will occasionally be subject to quality assurance checks. Why Join the TELUS International AI Community? Earn extra incomeAccess to our community wellbeing initiative Remote work & Location IndependenceBe your own bossFlexible Hours to fit in with your lifestyle Be a part of an online communityIf you have any queries about the role, please contact us at sourcingteam19@telusinternational.ai

title: Insight Analyst
description: About The PositionThis is a full-time position that consists of the development and communication of research insights to our clients, with the aim of helping them increase the ROI of their marketing campaigns. You will be in charge of supporting clients and informing Memorablel's overall product strategy. In order to develop this role, you will be trained to understand the key factors behind memory and attention.Through effective design and implementation of individual account strategies, we expect the candidate to build long term, sustainable and profitable relationships with the customer. The role requires high-level customer consultation in the marketing industry.ResponsibilitiesCoordinate the link with clients, managing daily requests and anticipating their testing demands to proactively find solutions. Create insights about the cognitive impact of our client's content, leveraging the predictions of our algorithms. This includes building and presenting reports yourself. Inform Memorable's product strategy, including changes to key features in the dashboard and the insights provided to clients. Build and maintain strong, long-lasting client relationships. Ensure the timely and successful delivery of our solutions according to customer needs and objectives. Research accounts to identify key players and conduct the sales process. Develop new business with existing clients and/or identify areas of improvement. About YouYou are a semi-senior marketer with experience working in media agencies. You are business-oriented, results-driven, and passionate about understanding consumers' experience with quantitative and/or qualitative research. You constantly aim for excellence and you are motivated to scale up a marketing optimization platform to reach market leadership. You thrive in dynamic environments and take the strong initiative to build an outcomes-maximizing work agenda.‍Minimum QualificationsBachelor's Degree in Marketing, Business, Communications, Engineering, or a related field. Relevant experience in consumer research, business intelligence, consumer product marketing, marketing management, market research, and /or strategic planning in large companies. Excellent English skills. Experience working directly with ad creative either on design, guidance, or approval of assets. Excellent communication skills and experience presenting research insights to clients. Outstanding organizational skills. Superior time management skills and strong attention to detail. Ability to work on multiple projects simultaneously, managing deliverables and deadlines. Preferred QualificationsExperience working in a growth-stage startup. Direct experience in enterprise/SAAS sales. Advanced degree in Marketing, Business, Communications, or related field. Strong network of established relationships across large brands, agencies and advertisers. Experience in account management. Successful sales experience. Ability to understand client strategies and tactical requirements to clearly articulate the company's offerings to develop solutions that deliver value. Work or research experience in cognitive science, neuroscience, or associated fields. ‍What We OfferCompetitive salary. Work from home with flexible work hours. Unlimited paid time off. Publication opportunities. Science-driven culture. Contacts within the Harvard and MIT ecosystem. Yearly bonus for personal learning.

description: About the JobCapgemini Engineering is an integral part of the Capgemini Group, a global leader in partnering with companies to transform and manage their business by harnessing the power of technology.World leader in engineering and R&D services, Capgemini Engineering combines its broad industry knowledge and cutting-edge technologies in digital and software to support the convergence of the physical and digital worlds.Capgemini Engineering has more than 55,000 engineer and scientist team members in over 30 countries across sectors including Aeronautics, Space, Defense, Naval, Automotive, Rail, Infrastructure & Transportation, Energy, Utilities & Chemicals, Life Sciences, Communications, Semiconductor & Electronics, Industrial & Consumer, Software & Internet.Please submit your resume in EnglishMinimum qualifications:Have 5+ years of professional experience as a Data Analyst mining large scale data and transforming data points to knowledge. Must be hands-on on data analysis tools and frameworks such as Hive, Spark SQL or Python to analyze any amount of data to both solve business requirements and feed in to engineering team to build data transformations. Extensive big data analysis and come up with logic to build analytical dimensions and metrics using Hive, Spark QL or Scripting Languages such as Python Preferred qualifications:Familiar with technologies relevant to the data such as Hadoop, OLAP databases and visualization tools such as Tableau or Looker or similar Establishes, supports and maintains standards of the analytics and data analytics process General understanding of databases (MySQL, SQL Server & Snowflake) General understanding of reporting solutions (Tableau, PowerBI, Looker, …) We are Capgemini Engineering:https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MZ0Z6PjdnQoWhy choose Capgemini Engineering?International projectsMulti-sector expertiseFocus on innovation and R&DCutting-edge technologiesWorld leader in engineering

title: Data Analyst (SQL and Visualization)
description: DescriptionWe are looking for a talented professional, motivated, and detail-oriented individuals to work with the Core Strategy & Operations team to build a central product launch calendar. This resource will be participating in design/development, testing, and maintenance of various metrics-based SQL scripts and dashboards. They will also assist in evaluating project needs, analyzing business requirements, and defining/building datasets/solutions to address complex business issues. We are looking for individuals with exceptional SQL coding/development skills. In addition, the candidate should have exceptional data visualization skills and be able to design executive friendly dashboards. We are passionate about delivering value to our customers and that is the reason we are searching for people with the same mindset to join our team!RequirementsBachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, Management Information Systems or a related field, or equivalent practical experience with 4-5 years of experience in a BI team or relatedHeavy experience with SQL and visualizationExperience building large datasets and maintaining crucial data pipelinesSuperior analytical skills and ability to communicate effectively with senior managementStrong written and verbal communication skillsExcellent project management and organizational skills We offerHealth InsuranceLife Insurance (SVO)Occupational Risk Insurance (ART)Paid Time Off – Vacations. 14 calendar days a year, the number of days will increase by seniority based on local law rulesSick leaveExceptional Leave. Take paid time off for your major life changes (childbirth, marriage, etc.)Compensation of costs for internet, electricity, and personal laptop usage (if applicable)Stable full-time workloadThousands of projects for top brandsStable incomeReferral ProgramCertification opportunitiesUnlimited access to LinkedIn learning solutionsLanguage coursesRelocation Assistance Package ConditionsBy applying to our role, you are agreeing that your personal data may be used as in set out in EPAM´s Privacy Notice (https://www.epam.com/applicant-privacy-notice) and Policy (https://www.epam.com/privacy-policy) Must have experienceExpertise in Angular and HTML is welcome. Not mustAbility to work in a fast-paced environment and navigate through ambiguityAbility to manage and coordinate multiple project assignments simultaneously in a deadline-driven environment, accepting ownership and accountability of the process and delivering on commitments

title: Científico de Datos (100% remoto)

Experiencia y competencias requeridas: Pasión por la tecnología y capacidad para desenvolverse en entornos complejos y rápidamente cambiantes.Dominio fluido del inglés (oral y escrito)Orientación al detalle y organizaciónCreatividad y confianza para expresar nuevas ideas.Habilidades probadas para la resolución de problemas.Auto-motivación y auto-disciplina.Debe sentirse cómodo trabajando en un equipo virtual.Gran capacidad de comunicación verbal y escrita.Experiencia en bases de datos.Formación académica completa en las carreras de Ingeniería tradicional, Ciencias de la Computación, Sistemas, Matemática, Física, o similares. Beneficios:100% REMOTODisponibilidad para viajarPrepaga familiar (OSDE) Desarrollo profesional3 semanas de vacaciones pagasBono por performance Si cumplís con los requerimientos, tenes ganas de emprender nuevos desafíos en un equipo internacional, no dudes en postularte!¡Te estamos esperando!

title: Online Data Analyst
description: TELUS International AI-Data Solutions partners with a diverse and vibrant community to help our customers enhance their AI and machine learning models. The work of our AI Community contributes to improving technology and the digital experiences of many people around the world. Our AI Community works in our proprietary AI training platform handling all data types (text, images, audio, video and geo) across 500+ languages and dialects. We offer flexible work-from-home opportunities for people with passion for languages. The jobs are part-time, and there is no fixed schedule. Whoever you are, wherever you come from, come join our global AI community. www.telusinternational.comWe are hiring freelance English & Spanish speaking Online Data Analyst’s for a project aimed at improving the content and quality of digital maps, which are used by millions of users globally. The job would suit someone who is detail-oriented, likes doing research and has a good knowledge of national and local geography.This is a freelance position on a flexible schedule - you can work in your own time whenever work is available. You will be completing research and evaluation tasks in a web-based environment, eg verifying and comparing data, determining the relevance and accuracy of information. You will be provided with guidelines for each task, which need to be followed. The project offers a variety of tasks, and work is paid per task.RequirementsFull Professional Proficiency in English & SpanishYou must be living in Argentina the last 2 consecutive yearsAbility to follow guidelines and do research online using search engines, online maps and website informationYou must have familiarity with current and historical business, media, sport, news, social media and cultural affairs in ArgentinaBeing open to work across a diverse set of Task Types (e.g. Maps, News, Audio tasks, Relevance)Applicants must be 18 years or over. ID verification must be attached when submitting your application.Working on this project will require you to go through a standard recruitment process (including passing an open book assessment). This is a long-term project and your work will occasionally be subject to quality assurance checks.Why Join the TELUS International AI Community?Earn extra incomeAccess to our community wellbeing initiativeRemote work & Location IndependenceBe your own bossFlexible Hours to fit in with your lifestyleBe a part of an online communityIf you have any queries about the role, please contact us at sourcingteam104@telusinternational.ai

the clusterExperience with the integration of data from multiple data sourcesExperience with various database technologies such as SQLServer, Redshift, Postgres, and RDSExperience with one or more of always-available serviceExperience with or knowledge of Agile Software Development methodologiesExcellent problem-solving and troubleshooting skillsExcellent oral and written communication skills with a keen sense of customer serviceExperience with collecting/managing/reporting on large data storesAwareness of Data governance and data quality principlesWell versed in Business Analytics including Services: XML, REST, SOAPExperience with Git or similar version control softwareExperience with integrations with and/or use of BI tools such as GoodData (Prefered), Tableau, PowerBI, or similarBroad experience with multiple RDBMS: MS SQLServer, Oracle, MySQL, PostgreSQL, RedshiftFamiliarity with SaaS/cloud data systems (e.g. Salesforce)Data warehouse design: star-schemas, change data capture, denormalizationSQL/DDL queries/Tuning techniques such as indexing, sorting, and distributionBS or MS degree in Computer Science or a related technical field3+ years of Data Pipeline development such as SnapLogic or Datastage, Informatica, or related experience3+ years of SQL experience (No-SQL experience is a plus)Experience designing, building, and maintaining data pipelinesWhat You'll Be DoingDevelop and maintain data models for core package application and reporting databases to describe objects and fields for support documentation and to facilitate custom application development and data integrationMonitoring execution and performance of daily pipelines, triage and escalate any issuesCollaborates with analytics and business teams to improve data models and data pipelines that feed business intelligence tools, increasing data accessibility and fostering data-driven decision-making across the organizationImplements processes and systems to monitor data quality, ensuring Your contributions are highly valued by clients, and the work you do often has a direct and significant impact on the client’s business.You will have the chance to work on a variety of projects for our incredible clients, which will help you quickly improve as a consultant and software engineer. You will get to work with modern languages and frameworks alongside some of the best developers in the world!So if you have the desire to be a part of an exciting, challenging, rapidly-growing software consultancy, please apply.

title: Insight Analyst
description: About The PositionThis is a full-time position that consists of the development and communication of research insights to our clients, with the aim of helping them increase the ROI of their marketing campaigns. You will be in charge of supporting clients and informing Memorablel's overall product strategy. In order to develop this role, you will be trained to understand the key factors behind memory and attention.Through effective design and implementation of individual account strategies, we expect the candidate to build long term, sustainable and profitable relationships with the customer. The role requires high-level customer consultation in the marketing industry.ResponsibilitiesCoordinate the link with clients, managing daily requests and anticipating their testing demands to proactively find solutions. Create insights about the cognitive impact of our client's content, leveraging the predictions of our algorithms. This includes building and presenting reports yourself. Inform Memorable's product strategy, including changes to key features in the dashboard and the insights provided to clients. Build and maintain strong, long-lasting client relationships. Ensure the timely and successful delivery of our solutions according to customer needs and objectives. Research accounts to identify key players and conduct the sales process. Develop new business with existing clients and/or identify areas of improvement. About YouYou are a semi-senior marketer with experience working in media agencies. You are business-oriented, results-driven, and passionate about understanding consumers' experience with quantitative and/or qualitative research. You constantly aim for excellence and you are motivated to scale up a marketing optimization platform to reach market leadership. You thrive in dynamic environments and take the strong initiative to build an outcomes-maximizing work agenda.‍Minimum QualificationsBachelor's Degree in Marketing, Business, Communications, Engineering, or a related field. Relevant experience in consumer research, business intelligence, consumer product marketing, marketing management, market research, and /or strategic planning in large companies. Excellent English skills. Experience working directly with ad creative either on design, guidance, or approval of assets. Excellent communication skills and experience presenting research insights to clients. Outstanding organizational skills. Superior time management skills and strong attention to detail. Ability to work on multiple projects simultaneously, managing deliverables and deadlines. Preferred QualificationsExperience working in a growth-stage startup. Direct experience in enterprise/SAAS sales. Advanced degree in Marketing, Business, Communications, or related field. Strong network of established relationships across large brands, agencies and advertisers. Experience in account management. Successful sales experience. Ability to understand client strategies and tactical requirements to clearly articulate the company's offerings to develop solutions that deliver value. Work or research experience in cognitive science, neuroscience, or associated fields. ‍What We OfferCompetitive salary. Work from home with flexible work hours. Unlimited paid time off. Publication opportunities. Science-driven culture. Contacts within the Harvard and MIT ecosystem. Yearly bonus for personal learning.

title: Data Science Analyst (Remote)
description: ¡Crecé junto a INTERINNOVACION! Posiciones REMOTAS 🎉INTERINNOVACION es la primera empresa de diseño y desarrollo de software en Latinoamérica 🚀Nuestros equipos de desarrollo nearshore brindan los beneficios de la experiencia tecnológica, la colaboración bilingüe y la alineación de la zona horaria en diversos rubros de la industria IT: bancarios, salud, educación y startups.Estamos buscando personas excepcionales en todo el mundo ¡y vos podés ser una de ellas!🔎Nos encontramos en la búsqueda Data Science Analyst Sr y SSr para sumarse a nuestro equipo.¿Qué esperamos de vos? Como Data Scientist, vas a trabajar con otros equipos en modelar, analizar, prototipar y construir sistemas que intenten predecir el comportamiento de los usuarios sobre las plataformas mejorando las experiencias de usuarios y creando herramientas para los mismos.¿Qué funciones tendrás? 🤓 Usar herramientas de procesamiento de lenguaje natural para enriquecer la información. Generar modelos de Machine Learning utilizando las herramientas adecuadas para los diferentes tipos de problemas de datos. Analizar los datos de los portales y grandes volúmenes de datos. Construir modelos predictivos e implementarlos en los sistemas del grupo. Monitorear performance de los mismos y encontrar puntos de mejoras en los datasets como en los modelos.Además valoramos 👉 Conocimientos previos en otras tecnologías. Experiencia en metodologías ágiles. Experiencia con uso de herramientas de integración continua.¿Por qué trabajar con nosotros?El trabajo en equipo es nuestra forma de entender el trabajo. One Team, One Goal 💪Te unirás a trabajadores en un equipo dinámico y de alto rendimiento ✅Sabrás lo que se espera de ti, tendrás metas y objetivos claros 🎯Abordaras cosas nuevas todo el tiempo, tendrás la libertad de autodirigir tu propio trabajo y obtendrás capacitación en las últimas tendencias💣Tendrás constantes oportunidades para mostrar tu talento💥💯Formaras parte de una cultura comprometida con la diversidad, la inclusión y la no discriminación 🤝📣 Modalidad de contratación en relación de dependencia. Remote & Flex Time para promover la conciliación entre el trabajo, el estudio y la vida personal. Trabajá desde cualquier parte del mundo! + 3 semanas de vacaciones + Prepaga Osde 📣Acerca de INTERINNOVACIÓNSomos una compañía de desarrollo de soluciones digitales a medida. Ayudamos a nuestros clientes a convertirse en la próxima y mejor versión de sí mismos.En Interinnovación sabemos que el mundo seguirá cambiando. La tecnología evolucionará. El negocio girará y girará de nuevo. Pero las relaciones, basadas en la confianza y el respeto, nos ayudarán a afrontar el futuro.Desplegamos tecnología. Construimos relaciones. #SomosInnovators 💡

title: Analista Funcional BI - REMOTO (1204)
description: ¿Qué hace la compañía?La empresa cuenta con diferentes unidades de negocios, las cuales integran un complejo agroindustrial con 7 plantas fabriles, más de 40 plantas de acopio en 8 provincias del país y explotaciones agropecuarias. Abastecen tanto al mercado argentino con productos de consumo masivo como también a más de 45 países del mundo.¿Qué buscan?A Nivel PersonalQue pongas el foco en lograr los objetivos y generar impacto en el resto de la empresa.Que puedas generar un buen clima laboral y crecer a nivel profesional junto con el equipo de trabajo.A Nivel TécnicoQue puedas realizar relevamientos de requerimientos técnicos en el cliente interno para el desarrollo de soluciones en Business Intelligence.Que puedas coordinar desarrollos con proveedores externos y con los equipos de tecnología.¿Qué necesitás para ser parte del equipo?Para sumarte a este desafío, será importante que cuentes con todos o al menos, gran parte de estos requerimientos:Experiencia de al menos 3 o 4 años en un rol similar.Experiencia en herramientas de Extracción, Transformación y Carga de Datos (ETL) (Preferencia SQL, SSIS).Análisis de Datos (Preferencia: MicroStrategy) (Otras: Power BI, Tableau, QlikView).Disponibilidad para asistir a la planta 1 vez al mes.Estudios avanzados o culminados en carreras de sistemas o afines.Experiencia en Proyectos de Inteligencia Artificial | No excluyente.Desarrollo en Python | No excluyente.¿Qué vas a hacer?Como Analista Funcional BI, tendrás a tu cargo las siguientes responsabilidades:Relevar las necesidades del cliente interno, diseñar la solución y gestionar el desarrollo de la misma.Relevar las necesidades con usuarios referentes.Diseño de Data Warehouse, Tableros, Reportes.Diseño de procesos ETL.¿Cuándo y dónde trabajarás?Los horarios de trabajo son de 8 a 12 y de 13:15 a 18 teniendo un espacio al mediodía para el almuerzo. En el caso de los días de oficina presencial el horario es de 9 a 18.La búsqueda está abierta a todo el país y la modalidad depende de la localización. Si estás en CABA la propuesta es de 4 días de Home Office y un día de presencialidad.¿Qué ofrecen?Relación de dependencia directa con la empresa.Prepaga para grupo familiar.Trabajo remoto con presencialidad 1 vez a la semana o 1 vez al mes, dependiendo de la localización.Bono anual.Integrarse a equipos de alto desempeño, utilizando tecnología de punta.Capacitación en nuevas tecnologías.Excelentes posibilidades de desarrollo y clima laboral.Trabajar en una empresa sólida y pujante.3 semanas de vacaciones.Becas para estudios de familiares.Beneficios por casamiento/nacimientos.Plan de telefonía móvil.¿De qué fases consta el proceso de selección?Tendrás una primera entrevista con nuestro Recruiter, Carla Carrizo Álvarez, para conocer tus experiencias laborales e intereses.Luego, con la empresa empleadora tendrás una entrevista para conocer al equipo de tecnología y de RRHH. Para finalizar el proceso de selección incluye una instancia de psicotécnico y estudios médicos.

title: Insight Analyst
description: About The PositionThis is a full-time position that consists of the development and communication of research insights to our clients, with the aim of helping them increase the ROI of their marketing campaigns. You will be in charge of supporting clients and informing Memorablel's overall product strategy. In order to develop this role, you will be trained to understand the key factors behind memory and attention.Through effective design and implementation of individual account strategies, we expect the candidate to build long term, sustainable and profitable relationships with the customer. The role requires high-level customer consultation in the marketing industry.ResponsibilitiesCoordinate the link with clients, managing daily requests and anticipating their testing demands to proactively find solutions. Create insights about the cognitive impact of our client's content, leveraging the predictions of our algorithms. This includes building and presenting reports yourself. Inform Memorable's product strategy, including changes to key features in the dashboard and the insights provided to clients. Build and maintain strong, long-lasting client relationships. Ensure the timely and successful delivery of our solutions according to customer needs and objectives. Research accounts to identify key players and conduct the sales process. Develop new business with existing clients and/or identify areas of improvement. About YouYou are a semi-senior marketer with experience working in media agencies. You are business-oriented, results-driven, and passionate about understanding consumers' experience with quantitative and/or qualitative research. You constantly aim for excellence and you are motivated to scale up a marketing optimization platform to reach market leadership. You thrive in dynamic environments and take the strong initiative to build an outcomes-maximizing work agenda.‍Minimum QualificationsBachelor's Degree in Marketing, Business, Communications, Engineering, or a related field. Relevant experience in consumer research, business intelligence, consumer product marketing, marketing management, market research, and /or strategic planning in large companies. Excellent English skills. Experience working directly with ad creative either on design, guidance, or approval of assets. Excellent communication skills and experience presenting research insights to clients. Outstanding organizational skills. Superior time management skills and strong attention to detail. Ability to work on multiple projects simultaneously, managing deliverables and deadlines. Preferred QualificationsExperience working in a growth-stage startup. Direct experience in enterprise/SAAS sales. Advanced degree in Marketing, Business, Communications, or related field. Strong network of established relationships across large brands, agencies and advertisers. Experience in account management. Successful sales experience. Ability to understand client strategies and tactical requirements to clearly articulate the company's offerings to develop solutions that deliver value. Work or research experience in cognitive science, neuroscience, or associated fields. ‍What We OfferCompetitive salary. Work from home with flexible work hours. Unlimited paid time off. Publication opportunities. Science-driven culture. Contacts within the Harvard and MIT ecosystem. Yearly bonus for personal learning.

title: Online Data Analyst
description: TELUS International AI-Data Solutions partners with a diverse and vibrant community to help our customers enhance their AI and machine learning models. The work of our AI Community contributes to improving technology and the digital experiences of many people around the world. Our AI Community works in our proprietary AI training platform handling all data types (text, images, audio, video and geo) across 500+ languages and dialects. We offer flexible work-from-home opportunities for people with passion for languages. The jobs are part-time, and there is no fixed schedule. Whoever you are, wherever you come from, come join our global AI community. www.telusinternational.com We are hiring freelance English & Spanish speaking Online Data Analyst’s for a project aimed at improving the content and quality of digital maps, which are used by millions of users globally. The job would suit someone who is detail-oriented, likes doing research and has a good knowledge of national and local geography.  This is a freelance position on a flexible schedule - you can work in your own time whenever work is available. You will be completing research and evaluation tasks in a web-based environment, eg verifying and comparing data, determining the relevance and accuracy of information. You will be provided with guidelines for each task, which need to be followed. The project offers a variety of tasks, and work is paid per task. RequirementsFull Professional Proficiency in English & SpanishYou must be living in Argentina the last 2 consecutive yearsAbility to follow guidelines and do research online using search engines, online maps and website informationYou must have familiarity with current and historical business, media, sport, news, social media and cultural affairs in ArgentinaBeing open to work across a diverse set of Task Types (e.g. Maps, News, Audio tasks, Relevance)Applicants must be 18 years or over. ID verification must be attached when submitting your application. Working on this project will require you to go through a standard recruitment process (including passing an open book assessment). This is a long-term project and your work will occasionally be subject to quality assurance checks. Why Join the TELUS International AI Community? Earn extra incomeAccess to our community wellbeing initiative Remote work & Location IndependenceBe your own bossFlexible Hours to fit in with your lifestyle Be a part of an online communityIf you have any queries about the role, please contact us at sourcingteam19@telusinternational.ai

description: ¿Qué hace la compañía?La empresa cuenta con diferentes unidades de negocios, las cuales integran un complejo agroindustrial con 7 plantas fabriles, más de 40 plantas de acopio en 8 provincias del país y explotaciones agropecuarias. Abastecen tanto al mercado argentino con productos de consumo masivo como también a más de 45 países del mundo.¿Qué buscan?A Nivel PersonalQue pongas el foco en lograr los objetivos y generar impacto en el resto de la empresa.Que puedas generar un buen clima laboral y crecer a nivel profesional junto con el equipo de trabajo.A Nivel TécnicoQue puedas realizar relevamientos de requerimientos técnicos en el cliente interno para el desarrollo de soluciones en Business Intelligence.Que puedas coordinar desarrollos con proveedores externos y con los equipos de tecnología.¿Qué necesitás para ser parte del equipo?Para sumarte a este desafío, será importante que cuentes con todos o al menos, gran parte de estos requerimientos:Experiencia de al menos 3 o 4 años en un rol similar.Experiencia en herramientas de Extracción, Transformación y Carga de Datos (ETL) (Preferencia SQL, SSIS).Análisis de Datos (Preferencia: MicroStrategy) (Otras: Power BI, Tableau, QlikView).Disponibilidad para asistir a la planta 1 vez al mes.Estudios avanzados o culminados en carreras de sistemas o afines.Experiencia en Proyectos de Inteligencia Artificial | No excluyente.Desarrollo en Python | No excluyente.¿Qué vas a hacer?Como Analista Funcional BI, tendrás a tu cargo las siguientes responsabilidades:Relevar las necesidades del cliente interno, diseñar la solución y gestionar el desarrollo de la misma.Relevar las necesidades con usuarios referentes.Diseño de Data Warehouse, Tableros, Reportes.Diseño de procesos ETL.¿Cuándo y dónde trabajarás?Los horarios de trabajo son de 8 a 12 y de 13:15 a 18 teniendo un espacio al mediodía para el almuerzo. En el caso de los días de oficina presencial el horario es de 9 a 18.La búsqueda está abierta a todo el país y la modalidad depende de la localización. Si estás en CABA la propuesta es de 4 días de Home Office y un día de presencialidad.¿Qué ofrecen?Relación de dependencia directa con la empresa.Prepaga para grupo familiar.Trabajo remoto con presencialidad 1 vez a la semana o 1 vez al mes, dependiendo de la localización.Bono anual.Integrarse a equipos de alto desempeño, utilizando tecnología de punta.Capacitación en nuevas tecnologías.Excelentes posibilidades de desarrollo y clima laboral.Trabajar en una empresa sólida y pujante.3 semanas de vacaciones.Becas para estudios de familiares.Beneficios por casamiento/nacimientos.Plan de telefonía móvil.¿De qué fases consta el proceso de selección?Tendrás una primera entrevista con nuestro Recruiter, Carla Carrizo Álvarez, para conocer tus experiencias laborales e intereses.Luego, con la empresa empleadora tendrás una entrevista para conocer al equipo de tecnología y de RRHH. Para finalizar el proceso de selección incluye una instancia de psicotécnico y estudios médicos.
location: Autonomous City of Buenos Aires, Buenos Aires Province, Argentina

title: Online Data Analyst
description: TELUS International AI-Data Solutions partners with a diverse and vibrant community to help our customers enhance their AI and machine learning models. The work of our AI Community contributes to improving technology and the digital experiences of many people around the world. Our AI Community works in our proprietary AI training platform handling all data types (text, images, audio, video and geo) across 500+ languages and dialects. We offer flexible work-from-home opportunities for people with passion for languages. The jobs are part-time, and there is no fixed schedule. Whoever you are, wherever you come from, come join our global AI community. www.telusinternational.com We are hiring freelance English & Spanish speaking Online Data Analyst’s for a project aimed at improving the content and quality of digital maps, which are used by millions of users globally. The job would suit someone who is detail-oriented, likes doing research and has a good knowledge of national and local geography.  This is a freelance position on a flexible schedule - you can work in your own time whenever work is available. You will be completing research and evaluation tasks in a web-based environment, eg verifying and comparing data, determining the relevance and accuracy of information. You will be provided with guidelines for each task, which need to be followed. The project offers a variety of tasks, and work is paid per task. RequirementsFull Professional Proficiency in English & SpanishYou must be living in Argentina the last 2 consecutive yearsAbility to follow guidelines and do research online using search engines, online maps and website informationYou must have familiarity with current and historical business, media, sport, news, social media and cultural affairs in ArgentinaBeing open to work across a diverse set of Task Types (e.g. Maps, News, Audio tasks, Relevance)Applicants must be 18 years or over. ID verification must be attached when submitting your application. Working on this project will require you to go through a standard recruitment process (including passing an open book assessment). This is a long-term project and your work will occasionally be subject to quality assurance checks. Why Join the TELUS International AI Community? Earn extra incomeAccess to our community wellbeing initiative Remote work & Location IndependenceBe your own bossFlexible Hours to fit in with your lifestyle Be a part of an online communityIf you have any queries about the role, please contact us at sourcingteam19@telusinternational.ai
location: Rosario, Santa Fe, Argentina

title: Insight Analyst
description: About The PositionThis is a full-time position that consists of the development and communication of research insights to our clients, with the aim of helping them increase the ROI of their marketing campaigns. You will be in charge of supporting clients and informing Memorablel's overall product strategy. In order to develop this role, you will be trained to understand the key factors behind memory and attention.Through effective design and implementation of individual account strategies, we expect the candidate to build long term, sustainable and profitable relationships with the customer. The role requires high-level customer consultation in the marketing industry.ResponsibilitiesCoordinate the link with clients, managing daily requests and anticipating their testing demands to proactively find solutions. Create insights about the cognitive impact of our client's content, leveraging the predictions of our algorithms. This includes building and presenting reports yourself. Inform Memorable's product strategy, including changes to key features in the dashboard and the insights provided to clients. Build and maintain strong, long-lasting client relationships. Ensure the timely and successful delivery of our solutions according to customer needs and objectives. Research accounts to identify key players and conduct the sales process. Develop new business with existing clients and/or identify areas of improvement. About YouYou are a semi-senior marketer with experience working in media agencies. You are business-oriented, results-driven, and passionate about understanding consumers' experience with quantitative and/or qualitative research. You constantly aim for excellence and you are motivated to scale up a marketing optimization platform to reach market leadership. You thrive in dynamic environments and take the strong initiative to build an outcomes-maximizing work agenda.‍Minimum QualificationsBachelor's Degree in Marketing, Business, Communications, Engineering, or a related field. Relevant experience in consumer research, business intelligence, consumer product marketing, marketing management, market research, and /or strategic planning in large companies. Excellent English skills. Experience working directly with ad creative either on design, guidance, or approval of assets. Excellent communication skills and experience presenting research insights to clients. Outstanding organizational skills. Superior time management skills and strong attention to detail. Ability to work on multiple projects simultaneously, managing deliverables and deadlines. Preferred QualificationsExperience working in a growth-stage startup. Direct experience in enterprise/SAAS sales. Advanced degree in Marketing, Business, Communications, or related field. Strong network of established relationships across large brands, agencies and advertisers. Experience in account management. Successful sales experience. Ability to understand client strategies and tactical requirements to clearly articulate the company's offerings to develop solutions that deliver value. Work or research experience in cognitive science, neuroscience, or associated fields. ‍What We OfferCompetitive salary. Work from home with flexible work hours. Unlimited paid time off. Publication opportunities. Science-driven culture. Contacts within the Harvard and MIT ecosystem. Yearly bonus for personal learning.

title: Senior Data Analyst, Growth
description: We believe in a world where homes are owned by regular people. Our mission is to provide authentic belonging experiences, empowering residents to become homeowners and homeowners to be financially free.Belong is changing what it means to rent a home by putting people first. It’s where hospitality meets consumer real estate—and it’s about to redefine an entire industry. We’re backed by Andreessen Horowitz (a16z), GGV Capital, Battery Ventures, and Fifth Wall just to name some of our all-star investors.We are looking for a Senior Product Analyst who will play a key role in growing our core products for homeowners and residents across several markets. The Senior Product Analyst is a role embedded within the product and engineering teams and is responsible for driving growth and strategic improvements through the end-to-end product development cycle. We are looking for someone with quantitative skills combined with strong business acumen and product sense as well as cross-functional collaboration skills.Responsibilities Apply your expertise in quantitative analysis, data mining of structured and unstructured data to extract key insights that drive strategic product and business decisions for BelongAbility to effectively present the data in a way that helps the company see and understand key insights into how our consumers interact with our ecosystem of productsIdentify growth opportunities that remove barriers to product adoption, engagement, retention, and monetization.Understand funnels, two-sided marketplace flywheels, multi-product ecosystems, and end-to-end consumer behaviors to shed light on the historical and future adoption of our products.Own, define, analyze and monitor metrics that help inform the health and success of Belong products in all markets we serve.Own, design, interpret and communicate A/B experiment results to product and stakeholder teams.Partner with cross-functional teams in product, business, and engineering teams on projects that identify new opportunities and help accelerate the growth and adoption of all products Influence teams across the company through the presentation of data-driven recommendations Demonstrate ability to switch between tactical execution and high-level strategyRequired QualificationsBS or MS degree in a technical discipline like Math, Statistics, Economics, Operations Research, or other relevant technical fields.4+ years of experience in a data analytics or data science role in an analytical, business strategy, marketing, or engineering organization.4+ years of experience with data querying and manipulation using SQL, Python, or R.Experience with design and running experiments  Strong communication and presentation skills.Self-starter, comfortable with ambiguity, experience initiating and driving projects with minimal oversight and guidance.We are an equal opportunity employer and value diversity at our company. We do not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, color, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, or disability status.

Full Professional Proficiency in English & Spanish  You must be living in Argentina the last 2 consecutive years  Ability to follow guidelines and do research online using search engines, online maps and website information  You must have familiarity with current and historical business, media, sport, news, social media and cultural affairs in Argentina  Being open to work across a diverse set of Task Types (e.g. Maps, News, Audio tasks, Relevance)  Applicants must be 18 years or over. title: Senior Data Analyst
description: T he Open English brand has been a leader in online English language learning for 15 years. The Next U brand, acquired in 2016, also provides a leading online learning platform focused on high demand digital and tech skills such as web and app development, digital marketing, and design. We are proud to be a global education technology (EdTech) leader offering online language learning to adults and to children through its Open English Junior brand, as well as various online certificates in digital, technology and business specializations. We are currently in over 25 countries on 3 continents.Join us, and be a part of our innovative team dedicated to empowering our students. We continuously look for the best professionals in their fields to join our talented team. We offer opportunities to collaborate and implement new ideas in a cheerful and inspiring work.Position OverviewWe are looking for a well experienced and talented data analyst to join our successful and growing BI & Analytics team in a data driven company. You’ll apply your technical expertise to help, solve, inform, influence, support, and execute business decisions in a fast paced and highly dynamic environmentResponsibilitiesUsing your technical expertise and deep understanding of modern BI, data science technologies, methods and tools, you will be working alone or with multi-disciplinary team members reporting, analyzing and assuring data quality to uncover useful information.You’ll work as a link between business stakeholders and the data, generating business insights and enabling data-driven business decision-making.Qualifications 4+ years experience with databases and complex data manipulation and development using SQL  Well proven experience in any enterprise reporting tool.  Experience distilling complex data from web services, data warehouses, structured and unstructured sources and converting data into simple KPIs, reports, visualizations, dashboards and scorecards to drive insights.  Experience performing cleansing, transformation and validation on the data subject assuring its quality.  Strong written and verbal communication skills to effectively relate data to coworkers  Tendency to pay close attention to small details that could impact results  Intermediate or higher written and verbal English skills If you are looking for a dynamic company, working with the latest technologies, great teamwork, professional opportunities and an excellent work environment, this is for you!

title: Data Science Analyst (Remote)
description: ¡Crecé junto a INTERINNOVACION! Posiciones REMOTAS 🎉INTERINNOVACION es la primera empresa de diseño y desarrollo de software en Latinoamérica 🚀Nuestros equipos de desarrollo nearshore brindan los beneficios de la experiencia tecnológica, la colaboración bilingüe y la alineación de la zona horaria en diversos rubros de la industria IT: bancarios, salud, educación y startups.Estamos buscando personas excepcionales en todo el mundo ¡y vos podés ser una de ellas!🔎Nos encontramos en la búsqueda Data Science Analyst Sr y SSr para sumarse a nuestro equipo.¿Qué esperamos de vos? Como Data Scientist, vas a trabajar con otros equipos en modelar, analizar, prototipar y construir sistemas que intenten predecir el comportamiento de los usuarios sobre las plataformas mejorando las experiencias de usuarios y creando herramientas para los mismos.¿Qué funciones tendrás? 🤓 Usar herramientas de procesamiento de lenguaje natural para enriquecer la información. Generar modelos de Machine Learning utilizando las herramientas adecuadas para los diferentes tipos de problemas de datos. Analizar los datos de los portales y grandes volúmenes de datos. Construir modelos predictivos e implementarlos en los sistemas del grupo. Monitorear performance de los mismos y encontrar puntos de mejoras en los datasets como en los modelos.Además valoramos 👉 Conocimientos previos en otras tecnologías. Experiencia en metodologías ágiles. Experiencia con uso de herramientas de integración continua.¿Por qué trabajar con nosotros?El trabajo en equipo es nuestra forma de entender el trabajo. One Team, One Goal 💪Te unirás a trabajadores en un equipo dinámico y de alto rendimiento ✅Sabrás lo que se espera de ti, tendrás metas y objetivos claros 🎯Abordaras cosas nuevas todo el tiempo, tendrás la libertad de autodirigir tu propio trabajo y obtendrás capacitación en las últimas tendencias💣Tendrás constantes oportunidades para mostrar tu talento💥💯Formaras parte de una cultura comprometida con la diversidad, la inclusión y la no discriminación 🤝📣 Modalidad de contratación en relación de dependencia. Remote & Flex Time para promover la conciliación entre el trabajo, el estudio y la vida personal. Trabajá desde cualquier parte del mundo! + 3 semanas de vacaciones + Prepaga Osde 📣Acerca de INTERINNOVACIÓNSomos una compañía de desarrollo de soluciones digitales a medida. Ayudamos a nuestros clientes a convertirse en la próxima y mejor versión de sí mismos.En Interinnovación sabemos que el mundo seguirá cambiando. La tecnología evolucionará. El negocio girará y girará de nuevo. Pero las relaciones, basadas en la confianza y el respeto, nos ayudarán a afrontar el futuro.Desplegamos tecnología. Construimos relaciones. #SomosInnovators 💡

description: We believe in a world where homes are owned by regular people. Our mission is to provide authentic belonging experiences, empowering residents to become homeowners and homeowners to be financially free.Belong is changing what it means to rent a home by putting people first. It’s where hospitality meets consumer real estate—and it’s about to redefine an entire industry. We’re backed by Andreessen Horowitz (a16z), GGV Capital, Battery Ventures, and Fifth Wall just to name some of our all-star investors.We are looking for a Senior Product Analyst who will play a key role in growing our core products for homeowners and residents across several markets. The Senior Product Analyst is a role embedded within the product and engineering teams and is responsible for driving growth and strategic improvements through the end-to-end product development cycle. We are looking for someone with quantitative skills combined with strong business acumen and product sense as well as cross-functional collaboration skills.Responsibilities Apply your expertise in quantitative analysis, data mining of structured and unstructured data to extract key insights that drive strategic product and business decisions for BelongAbility to effectively present the data in a way that helps the company see and understand key insights into how our consumers interact with our ecosystem of productsIdentify growth opportunities that remove barriers to product adoption, engagement, retention, and monetization.Understand funnels, two-sided marketplace flywheels, multi-product ecosystems, and end-to-end consumer behaviors to shed light on the historical and future adoption of our products.Own, define, analyze and monitor metrics that help inform the health and success of Belong products in all markets we serve.Own, design, interpret and communicate A/B experiment results to product and stakeholder teams.Partner with cross-functional teams in product, business, and engineering teams on projects that identify new opportunities and help accelerate the growth and adoption of all products Influence teams across the company through the presentation of data-driven recommendations Demonstrate ability to switch between tactical execution and high-level strategyRequired QualificationsBS or MS degree in a technical discipline like Math, Statistics, Economics, Operations Research, or other relevant technical fields.4+ years of experience in a data analytics or data science role in an analytical, business strategy, marketing, or engineering organization.4+ years of experience with data querying and manipulation using SQL, Python, or R.Experience with design and running experiments  Strong communication and presentation skills.Self-starter, comfortable with ambiguity, experience initiating and driving projects with minimal oversight and guidance.We are an equal opportunity employer and value diversity at our company. We do not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, color, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, or disability status.

Experiencia y competencias requeridas: Pasión por la tecnología y capacidad para desenvolverse en entornos complejos y rápidamente cambiantes.Dominio fluido del inglés (oral y escrito)Orientación al detalle y organizaciónCreatividad y confianza para expresar nuevas ideas.Habilidades probadas para la resolución de problemas.Auto-motivación y auto-disciplina.Debe sentirse cómodo trabajando en un equipo virtual.Gran capacidad de comunicación verbal y escrita.Experiencia en bases de datos.Formación académica completa en las carreras de Ingeniería tradicional, Ciencias de la Computación, Sistemas, Matemática, Física, o similares. Beneficios:100% REMOTODisponibilidad para viajarPrepaga familiar (OSDE) Desarrollo profesional3 semanas de vacaciones pagasBono por performance Si cumplís con los requerimientos, tenes ganas de emprender nuevos desafíos en un equipo internacional, no dudes en postularte!¡Te estamos esperando!

title: Online Data Analyst - Argentina
description: We are hiring freelance English & Spanish speaking Online Data Analyst’s for a project aimed at improving the content and quality of digital maps, which are used by millions of users globally. The job would suit someone who is detail-oriented, likes doing research and has a good knowledge of national and local geography.  Full Professional Proficiency in English & Spanish  You must be living in Argentina the last 2 consecutive years  Ability to follow guidelines and do research online using search engines, online maps and website information  You must have familiarity with current and historical business, media, sport, news, social media and cultural affairs in Argentina  Being open to work across a diverse set of Task Types (e.g. Maps, News, Audio tasks, Relevance)  Applicants must be 18 years or over. ID verification must be attached when submitting your application. Working on this project will require you to go through a standard recruitment process (including passing an open book assessment). Additional Job DescriptionTELUS International AI-Data Solutions partners with a diverse and vibrant community to help our customers enhance their AI and machine learning models. The work of our AI Community contributes to improving technology and the digital experiences of many people around the world. Our AI Community works in our proprietary AI training platform handling all data types (text, images, audio, video and geo) across 500+ languages and dialects. We offer flexible work-from-home opportunities for people with passion for languages. The jobs are part-time, and there is no fixed schedule. Whoever you are, wherever you come from, come join our global AI community. www.telusinternational.comThis is a freelance position on a flexible schedule - you can work in your own time whenever work is available. You will be completing research and evaluation tasks in a web-based environment, eg verifying and comparing data, determining the relevance and accuracy of information. You will be provided with guidelines for each task, which need to be followed. The project offers a variety of tasks, and work is paid per task.Why Join the TELUS International AI Community?Earn extra incomeAccess to our community wellbeing initiativeRemote work & Location IndependenceBe your own bossFlexible Hours to fit in with your lifestyleBe a part of an online community

title: Senior Data Analyst
description: T he Open English brand has been a leader in online English language learning for 15 years. The Next U brand, acquired in 2016, also provides a leading online learning platform focused on high demand digital and tech skills such as web and app development, digital marketing, and design. We are proud to be a global education technology (EdTech) leader offering online language learning to adults and to children through its Open English Junior brand, as well as various online certificates in digital, technology and business specializations. We are currently in over 25 countries on 3 continents.Join us, and be a part of our innovative team dedicated to empowering our students. We continuously look for the best professionals in their fields to join our talented team. We offer opportunities to collaborate and implement new ideas in a cheerful and inspiring work.Position OverviewWe are looking for a well experienced and talented data analyst to join our successful and growing BI & Analytics team in a data driven company. You’ll apply your technical expertise to help, solve, inform, influence, support, and execute business decisions in a fast paced and highly dynamic environmentResponsibilitiesUsing your technical expertise and deep understanding of modern BI, data science technologies, methods and tools, you will be working alone or with multi-disciplinary team members reporting, analyzing and assuring data quality to uncover useful information.You’ll work as a link between business stakeholders and the data, generating business insights and enabling data-driven business decision-making.Qualifications 4+ years experience with databases and complex data manipulation and development using SQL  Well proven experience in any enterprise reporting tool.  Experience distilling complex data from web services, data warehouses, structured and unstructured sources and converting data into simple KPIs, reports, visualizations, dashboards and scorecards to drive insights.  Experience performing cleansing, transformation and validation on the data subject assuring its quality.  Strong written and verbal communication skills to effectively relate data to coworkers  Tendency to pay close attention to small details that could impact results  Intermediate or higher written and verbal English skills If you are looking for a dynamic company, working with the latest technologies, great teamwork, professional opportunities and an excellent work environment, this is for you!

title: Data Science Analyst (Remote)
description: ¡Crecé junto a INTERINNOVACION! Posiciones REMOTAS 🎉INTERINNOVACION es la primera empresa de diseño y desarrollo de software en Latinoamérica 🚀Nuestros equipos de desarrollo nearshore brindan los beneficios de la experiencia tecnológica, la colaboración bilingüe y la alineación de la zona horaria en diversos rubros de la industria IT: bancarios, salud, educación y startups.Estamos buscando personas excepcionales en todo el mundo ¡y vos podés ser una de ellas!🔎Nos encontramos en la búsqueda Data Science Analyst Sr y SSr para sumarse a nuestro equipo.¿Qué esperamos de vos? Como Data Scientist, vas a trabajar con otros equipos en modelar, analizar, prototipar y construir sistemas que intenten predecir el comportamiento de los usuarios sobre las plataformas mejorando las experiencias de usuarios y creando herramientas para los mismos.¿Qué funciones tendrás? 🤓 Usar herramientas de procesamiento de lenguaje natural para enriquecer la información. Generar modelos de Machine Learning utilizando las herramientas adecuadas para los diferentes tipos de problemas de datos. Analizar los datos de los portales y grandes volúmenes de datos. Construir modelos predictivos e implementarlos en los sistemas del grupo. Monitorear performance de los mismos y encontrar puntos de mejoras en los datasets como en los modelos.Además valoramos 👉 Conocimientos previos en otras tecnologías. Experiencia en metodologías ágiles. Experiencia con uso de herramientas de integración continua.¿Por qué trabajar con nosotros?El trabajo en equipo es nuestra forma de entender el trabajo. One Team, One Goal 💪Te unirás a trabajadores en un equipo dinámico y de alto rendimiento ✅Sabrás lo que se espera de ti, tendrás metas y objetivos claros 🎯Abordaras cosas nuevas todo el tiempo, tendrás la libertad de autodirigir tu propio trabajo y obtendrás capacitación en las últimas tendencias💣Tendrás constantes oportunidades para mostrar tu talento💥💯Formaras parte de una cultura comprometida con la diversidad, la inclusión y la no discriminación 🤝📣 Modalidad de contratación en relación de dependencia. Remote & Flex Time para promover la conciliación entre el trabajo, el estudio y la vida personal. Trabajá desde cualquier parte del mundo! + 3 semanas de vacaciones + Prepaga Osde 📣Acerca de INTERINNOVACIÓNSomos una compañía de desarrollo de soluciones digitales a medida. Ayudamos a nuestros clientes a convertirse en la próxima y mejor versión de sí mismos.En Interinnovación sabemos que el mundo seguirá cambiando. La tecnología evolucionará. El negocio girará y girará de nuevo. Pero las relaciones, basadas en la confianza y el respeto, nos ayudarán a afrontar el futuro.Desplegamos tecnología. Construimos relaciones. #SomosInnovators 💡

title: Data Engineer - Remote, Full-Time
description: Bluelight Consulting is a leading software consultancy seeking a skilled Data Engineer to join our fast-growing team. Our mission is to design and develop technology that improves the lives of its users while providing an exceptionally high level of service to our clients.We are looking for Data Engineer who wants to be part of a fast-paced, dynamic environment, where everyone’s opinions and efforts are valued. We hire outstanding individuals and give them the opportunity to thrive in a collaborative atmosphere that values learning, growth, and hard work.Our team is distributed across the United State and Central / South America. If you have the desire to be a part of an exciting, challenging, and rapidly-growing software development consultancy, and if you are passionate about software development and creating the finest apps in the marketplace, please apply below.What We Are Looking ForExperience with AWS services including but not limited to S3, Athena, EC2, EMR, and GlueAbility to solve any ongoing issues with operating the clusterExperience with the integration of data from multiple data sourcesExperience with various database technologies such as SQLServer, Redshift, Postgres, and RDSExperience with one or more of the following data integration platforms: Pentaho Kettle, SnapLogic, Talend OpenStudio, Jitterbit, Informatica PowerCenter, or similarKnowledge of best practices and IT operations in an always-up, always-available serviceExperience with or knowledge of Agile Software Development methodologiesExcellent problem-solving and troubleshooting skillsExcellent oral and written communication skills with a keen sense of customer serviceExperience with collecting/managing/reporting on large data storesAwareness of Data governance and data quality principlesWell versed in Business Analytics including basic metric building and troubleshootingUnderstand Integration architecture: application integration and data flow diagrams, source-to-target mappings, data dictionary reportsFamiliar with Web Services: XML, REST, SOAPExperience with Git or similar version control softwareExperience with integrations with and/or use of BI tools such as GoodData (Prefered), Tableau, PowerBI, or similarBroad experience with multiple RDBMS: MS SQLServer, Oracle, MySQL, PostgreSQL, RedshiftFamiliarity with SaaS/cloud data systems (e.g. Salesforce)Data warehouse design: star-schemas, change data capture, denormalizationSQL/DDL queries/Tuning techniques such as indexing, sorting, and distributionBS or MS degree in Computer Science or a related technical field3+ years of Data Pipeline development such as SnapLogic or Datastage, Informatica, or related experience3+ years of SQL experience (No-SQL experience is a plus)Experience designing, building, and maintaining data pipelinesWhat You'll Be DoingDevelop and maintain data models for core package application and reporting databases to describe objects and fields for support documentation and to facilitate custom application development and data integrationMonitoring execution and performance of daily pipelines, triage and escalate any issuesCollaborates with analytics and business teams to improve data models and data pipelines that feed business intelligence tools, increasing data accessibility and fostering data-driven decision-making across the organizationImplements processes and systems to monitor data quality, ensuring production data is always accurate and available for key stakeholders and business processesWrites unit/integration tests, contributes to engineering wiki, and documents workPerforms data analysis required to troubleshoot data-related issues and assist in the resolution of data issuesWork within AWS/Linux cloud systems environment in support of data integration solutionWorks closely with a team of frontend and backend engineers, product managers, and analystsTeamwork: Collaborate with team members. Share knowledge, provide visibility of interpersonal accomplishments and follow directions when providedCompany BenefitsCompetitive salary and bonuses, including performance-based salary increasesGenerous paid-time-off policyTechnology / Office stipend100% remote work, now and post COVIDContinuing education, training, conferencesCompany-sponsored coursework, exams, and certificationsBeing a software consultant is a fun, challenging, and rewarding career choice for engineers. Your contributions are highly valued by clients, and the work you do often has a direct and significant impact on the client’s business.You will have the chance to work on a variety of projects for our incredible clients, which will help you quickly improve as a consultant and software engineer. You will get to work with modern languages and frameworks alongside some of the best developers in the world!So if you have the desire to be a part of an exciting, challenging, rapidly-growing software consultancy, please apply.

description: Job DescriptionWe are looking for a dynamic and enthusiastic Data Scientist to join our team of Analytics professionals.You’ll join a high-performing team that gets continuous training and collaborates on different innovation projects, locally and internationally.As part of our team, you’ll take on new challenges in a fast-paced environment and get to know various industries and clients.Role responsibilitiesDesign and implement Business Intelligence and/or Analytics solutions.Understand and analyze the specified requirements and make estimations of time and issues that may arise.Suggest improvements or recommend alternatives to the defined requirements (technical or functional) and validate them with the project referents.Work closely with the clients’ counterparts, leaning on Intermedia’s project referents.Actively collaborate with different teams to develop tasks according to plan.Prioritize tasks to continuously produce deliverables for the development team.Improve your knowledge and do continuous technical training to adapt to changes and different market needs.Promote the team’s technical development. Have initiative and be proactive to suggest ideas and improvements.RequirementsAdvanced student or graduate of IT careers.5+ years of experience in advisory, delivering Business Intelligence and/or Business Analytics solutions.4+ years of experience in Pentaho (PUC – Pentaho User Console and PDI – Pentaho Data Integration).Database architecture and data storage.Relational databases queries (Postgre SQL, MySQL, SQL Server).Dashboard design, analysis, and implementation.Professional English level.Proactivity, flexibility, and adaptability to change.We valueExperience in data analysis and visualization tools (Power BI, Pentaho, QlikSense, Superset).Non-relational databases (MongoDB, ElasticSearch).Design and implementation of models for data analysis (descriptive, predictive, prescriptive, etc).Knowledge of other Pentaho Suite tools (Schema Workbench, Pentaho Reporting).Knowledge of Big Data technologies and platforms.Knowledge of data science tools and languages: Python, R.Knowledge of machine learning.Knowledge of JavaScript.Office HoursFull time availability from Monday to Friday, 9 am to 6 pm (We offer flextime).How we workYou will be part of an amazing team, where we value doing the right thing. At Intermedia, we develop a continuous feedback and communication culture, which makes us all feel a strong sense of belonging.Our main goal is to enjoy what we do. description: ¡Crecé junto a INTERINNOVACION! Remote & Flex Time para promover la conciliación entre el trabajo, el estudio y la vida personal. Trabajá desde cualquier parte del mundo! + 3 semanas de vacaciones + Prepaga Osde 📣Acerca de INTERINNOVACIÓNSomos una compañía de desarrollo de soluciones digitales a medida. Ayudamos a nuestros clientes a convertirse en la próxima y mejor versión de sí mismos.En Interinnovación sabemos que el mundo seguirá cambiando. La tecnología evolucionará.
